All Implemented Interfaces:
DelegateDataBuilder<NetExcessOfLossRITreaty>, ValueGenerator<NetExcessOfLossRITreaty>
public class NxolRIAgreementBuilder extends NonProportionalRIAgreementBuilder<NetExcessOfLossRITreaty,NxolRIAgreementBuilder>

DataBuilder for creating non-excess of loss non-proportional reinsurance agreements.
